Blog 1: Starting the Website

Learning full stack mobile and web development is a difficult goal to map out because there are so many different paths to approach the problem. Ultimately, I decided to start with learning HTML and CSS so that I could start building and inspire myself to learn the rest through the gaps that would exist in the projects I'm working on.

In this blog, I talk about my thought processes and challenges when deciding how to approach my goals. Click the link to read the rest!
